level.heading: Potomac interceptor - Appropriations.
level.text: For the purposes of carrying out the provisions of this subchapter, there is authorized to be appropriated, without fiscal year limitation, the sum of $3,000,000, as the federal contribution toward the cost of planning, acquiring rights-of-way for, and constructing the Potomac interceptor.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-42
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2401.13.
